QuestData.Title: Hozen in the Mist
QuestData.Description: Dear $p,$b$bYour research into the hozen has proven quite enlightening.$b$bIf you visit us at the Seat of Knowledge in Vale of Eternal Blossoms we can add this contribution to your personal collection.$b$bThank you for your diligence!$b$bSincerely,$b$bLorewalker Cho
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Hozen in the Mist to Lorewalker Cho at the Seat of Knowledge.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Lorewalker Cho at the Seat of Knowledge in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
